#id=1
#text=I wanted to take a trip on a train .
#id=2
#text=I thought it would be fun to travel through the countryside .
#id=3
#text=I called the train directory and booked a ticket for a country journey day trip .
#id=4
#text=I arrived at the train station , full of excitement .
#id=5
#text=I handed my ticket to the conductor .
#id=6
#text=I found my seat which was near a window , so I would be able to take in all the sights as the train traveled along .
#id=7
#text=After the train car was filled , the conductor told us that we would be departing on our journey and when we would arrive at our destination .
#id=8
#text=The train lurched forward with a mighty gust and began to chug along .
#id=9
#text=I could hear the wheels clacking across the tracks as I enjoyed the lovely scenery that was passing by .
#text=When we arrived at the destination , we approached the station and the train screeched to a stop .
#text=I exited the train filled with wonderful thoughts about my experience .
